}} 'Helicon Focus' is a proprietary commercial digital image processing tool,
first released in 2003, developed and published by Helicon Soft Limited. Like
programs such as CombineZ, Helicon Focus is designed to blend the focused areas
of several partially focused digital photographs to increase the depth of field
(DOF) in an image.
